scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && xcopy /y /s node_modules\xterm\css\xterm.css ..\vnext\FluentTerminal.App\FluentTerminal.App\Client\ && xcopy /y /s src\style.css ..\vnext\FluentTerminal.App\FluentTerminal.App\Client\ && xcopy /y /s src\index.html ..\vnext\FluentTerminal.App\FluentTerminal.App\Client\ && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=../vnext/FluentTerminal.App/FluentTerminal.App/Client/bundle.js
